languages.text: "Сущность Марнат — божество великой мудрости. Это она, великая мудрость, прервала Цикл, и всякий, кто вкусил ее, канул в небытие. Мы же есть, потому что не вкушали ее. И мне нечего сказать тебе о ней, призрак".

"Marnat is a divine being of great wisdom. It was this great wisdom that discontinued the Cycle, and all who had partaken of it lapsed into nothingness. We never partook of the wisdom, which is why we exist. And I have nothing to tell you about it, ghost."
languages.original_text: "Сущность Марнат — божество великой мудрости. Это она, великая мудрость, прервала Цикл, и всякий, кто вкусил ее, канул в небытие. Мы же есть, потому что не вкушали ее. И мне нечего сказать тебе о ней, призрак".

traits.locale_text: "Marnat is a divine being of great wisdom. It was this great wisdom that discontinued the Cycle, and all who had partaken of it lapsed into nothingness. We never partook of the wisdom, which is why we exist. And I have nothing to tell you about it, ghost."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: "Marnat is a divine being of great wisdom. It was this great wisdom that discontinued the Cycle, and all who had partaken of it lapsed into nothingness. We never partook of the wisdom, which is why we exist. And I have nothing to tell you about it, ghost."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: 「マルナトは大いなる知恵の神。サイクルを断ち切れというこの大いなる知恵。無になったものを喰らい続けたすべての者。私たちは一度も知恵を喰らうことがなかったために存在している。マルナトについて伝えられることは以上だ、亡霊よ」
languages.original_text: "Marnat is a divine being of great wisdom. It was this great wisdom that discontinued the Cycle, and all who had partaken of it lapsed into nothingness. We never partook of the wisdom, which is why we exist. And I have nothing to tell you about it, ghost."

traits.locale_text: 「マルナトは大いなる知恵の神。サイクルを断ち切れというこの大いなる知恵。無になったものを喰らい続けたすべての者。私たちは一度も知恵を喰らうことがなかったために存在している。マルナトについて伝えられることは以上だ、亡霊よ」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “玛纳特是一位拥有伟大智慧的神明，但正是这种伟大的智慧终止了循环，使所有参与其中的人都陷入了虚无。我们从未拥有过智慧，所以我们才能存在。我没有什么可告诉你的，鬼魂。”
languages.original_text: "Marnat is a divine being of great wisdom. It was this great wisdom that discontinued the Cycle, and all who had partaken of it lapsed into nothingness. We never partook of the wisdom, which is why we exist. And I have nothing to tell you about it, ghost."

traits.locale_text: “玛纳特是一位拥有伟大智慧的神明，但正是这种伟大的智慧终止了循环，使所有参与其中的人都陷入了虚无。我们从未拥有过智慧，所以我们才能存在。我没有什么可告诉你的，鬼魂。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Marnat est un être divin dont l'immense sagesse a provoqué l'Interruption du Cycle, envoyant tous ceux qui y avaient participé dans le néant. Nous n'en faisions pas partie, c'est pourquoi nous existons. Et je n'ai rien à vous dire sur le sujet, fantôme. »
languages.original_text: "Marnat is a divine being of great wisdom. It was this great wisdom that discontinued the Cycle, and all who had partaken of it lapsed into nothingness. We never partook of the wisdom, which is why we exist. And I have nothing to tell you about it, ghost."

traits.locale_text: « Marnat est un être divin dont l'immense sagesse a provoqué l'interruption du Cycle, envoyant tous ceux qui y avaient participé dans le néant. Nous n'en faisions pas partie, c'est pourquoi nous existons. Et je n'ai rien à vous dire sur le sujet, fantôme. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «Marnat es un ser divino que posee gran sabiduría. Fue justo eso lo que hizo que el Ciclo se interrumpiese y todo el que participara en él cayera en la nada. Nosotros nunca nos unimos, por eso seguimos existiendo. Y no tengo nada que decirte al respecto, fantasma».
languages.original_text: "Marnat is a divine being of great wisdom. It was this great wisdom that discontinued the Cycle, and all who had partaken of it lapsed into nothingness. We never partook of the wisdom, which is why we exist. And I have nothing to tell you about it, ghost."

traits.locale_text: «Marnat es un ser divino que posee gran sabiduría. Fue justo eso lo que hizo que el Ciclo se interrumpiese y todo el que participara en él cayera en la nada. Nosotros nunca nos unimos, por eso seguimos existiendo. Y no tengo nada que decirte al respecto, fantasma».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Marnat ist ein göttliches Wesen von großer Weisheit. Es war diese große Weisheit, die den Zyklus unterbrochen hat, und hatte, die davon kosteten, fielen ins Nichts. Wir haben nie davon gekostet, daher existieren wir noch. Und ich habe Euch nichts dazu zu sagen, Geist."
languages.original_text: "Marnat is a divine being of great wisdom. It was this great wisdom that discontinued the Cycle, and all who had partaken of it lapsed into nothingness. We never partook of the wisdom, which is why we exist. And I have nothing to tell you about it, ghost."

traits.locale_text: "Marnat ist ein göttliches Wesen von großer Weisheit. Es war diese große Weisheit, die den Zyklus unterbrochen hat, und hatte, die davon kosteten, fielen ins Nichts. Wir haben nie davon gekostet, daher existieren wir noch. Und ich habe Euch nichts dazu zu sagen, Geist."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Marnat; yüce bir bilgeliğe haiz, ilahi bir varlıktır. Döngü'nün süreğini bozan ve ona nail olan her şeyi hiçliğe sevk eden de bu yüce bilgelikti. Biz o bilgeliğe hiç nail olmadık, o nedenle de varız. Senin gibi bir hayalete onun hakkında bilgi vermeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Marnat is a divine being of great wisdom. It was this great wisdom that discontinued the Cycle, and all who had partaken of it lapsed into nothingness. We never partook of the wisdom, which is why we exist. And I have nothing to tell you about it, ghost."

traits.locale_text: "Marnat, yüce bir bilgeliğe sahip ilahi bir varlıktır. Döngü'nün süreğini bozan ve ona nail olan her şeyi hiçliğe sevk eden de bu yüce bilgelikti. Biz o bilgeliğe hiç nail olmadık, o nedenle de varız. Ve senin gibi bir hayalete onun hakkında söyleyecek hiçbir şeyim yok."
traits.speaker: Chief
